title: URF mode??
body:
Hey Riot,
I am truly outraged, I woke up thismorning on april first hoping to play a sweet game of Ultra Rapid Fire. But there was no URF mode. 
This is the first time I've ever put in the effort to make a post on the boards, so that alone proves the extent of my fury. I don't know what the bloody heck you were thinking, I've been playing this game for one year now and on EVERY single april fools I have played URF, but not today. Why is that? Is not letting me and countless others play URF the prank this year?
I'm very disapointed, 
Sincerely Snowpiggy

replies.body: There was no URF on April fools last year? Get your facts right first...

ITS JUST A PRANK BRO

YOU GOT FOOLED
This became a thing of the past when we got the RGM queue.
Yeah but All Random URF is in the rotations I think, they could give us normal URF just for a day

ARURF is the "updated" version of URF, so I doubt we will see "standard" URF at any point unless Riot wants to make some kind of "nostalgia" promotion out of it (especially considering the issues Riot took with the severe lack of diversity in the mode).

Thats a damn shame
Thanks for letting me know
